titleStmt.title: Special and chosen sermons of D. Martin Luther collected out of his writings and preachings for the necessary instruction and edification of such, as hunger and seeke after the perfect knowledge and inestimable glorie which is in Christ Iesu, to the comfort and saluation of their soules. Englished by VV.G.
Sermons. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Gace, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the Blacke Friers by Ludgate. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: The "admonition to the Christian reader" is signed "I. Fox". Variant: admonition signed "I. Foxe".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
